Story.Name: Story_JB
Story.Desc: The mountain hides in the mastiff, and Lin Jing has long berry moss. Danzao mud is old, Yuantan robs wood ash. Mo Yun's fairy tales are magical, and Penglai is just a stone's throw away.

Story.Name: ZRZD
Story.Desc: Boys, living beings each have their own way of living. All things live together without damaging each other, and Tao runs side by side without contradicting them. Different Taos grow freely in the universe and express their Tao. These are the ways of nature.

li.OKResult: me:AddMsg("[NAME]Look at the group notifications, when will it be updated, anyway, now it is more");

Story.Name: Story_Item_Dan_PTMY
Story.Desc: Yaochi's secret recipe for repairing Xianlu can take effect after refining.

li.OKResult: me:AddMsg("[NAME]The immortal road has been successfully repaired, and it can be repaired again."); me.npcObj.PropertyMgr:RemoveModifier("SysPracticeDie");

Story.Name: Story_Item_XY
Story.Desc: Refining and refining Xianyuan must practice the same method to the highest level to succeed. The higher the Daoxing, the higher the probability of successful refining. However, this move has nothing to do with peace, and if it fails, it will be severely damaged and increase the condemnation. Do you want to refining Xianyuan?

li.Display: Come on, it's all about to die anyway. (More than the dragon period and the same attributes)
li.OKResult: local itemobj = story:GetBindThing() local nE = 0 if itemobj.ElementKind == g_emElementKind.None then nE = 0 elseif itemobj.ElementKind == g_emElementKind.Jin then nE = 1 elseif itemobj.ElementKind == g_emElementKind.Mu then nE = 2 elseif itemobj.ElementKind == g_emElementKind.Shui then nE = 3 elseif itemobj.ElementKind == g_emElementKind.Huo then nE = 4 elseif itemobj.ElementKind == g_emElementKind.Tu then nE = 5 else nE = 6 end if nE == me:GetGElementKind() then if me:GetGLevel() >= 11 then local nR = world:RandomInt(150,300) if nR <= me:GetDaoHang() then me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME]Attempt to refine and refine Xianyuan may be due to chance, and it was surprisingly and dangerously completed.")); local nC = me:GetFlag(99); me:SetFlag(99,nC + 1); local nV = math.floor(math.max(0,(1-nC * 0.1)) * me:RandomInt(100,150)) me:ModifierProperty("AbilityLvAddV",-nV); if nC <= 2 then me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME]As a result, they were able to peek into some heavens and gain a lot."));me:AddMsg(string.format(XT("[NAME]Lowered%s point."), tostring(nV))); elseif nC <= 4 then me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME]As a result, he was able to peek into some heavenly paths, but with several enlightenments, the effect was negligible."));me:AddMsg(string.format(XT("[NAME]The deeds decreased.%s point."), tostring(nV))); elseif nC <= 6 then me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME]As a result, he was able to peek into some heavens, but the effect has been negligible due to repeated enlightenment."));me:AddMsg(string.format(XT("[NAME]The deeds decreased.%s point."), tostring(nV))); elseif nC <= 7 then me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME]Peeping at the Tao repeatedly for some time, gradually gained some experience, and finally took advantage of this opportunity to differentiate the three Yuanshen distraction."));me:DivideGodSoul(true,3); elseif nC <= 11 then me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME]Peeping at the Tao repeatedly for some time, I gradually gained some experience. Finally, I took advantage of this opportunity to get in touch with the Tao, reducing the intensity of the Tianjie."));me:ModifierProperty("GodPenaltyAddV",-15); else me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME]As a result, I was able to peer into some heavenly ways, but because of too many times of enlightenment, I had no sense at all.")); end else me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME]Attempt to refine Huayuan, but in the end, due to insufficient Taoism, he failed to control the heavenly atmosphere contained in it."));me:AddMsg(XT("Although it ’s just a leak of breath, the heavens instantly bit back,[NAME]Also seriously injured ..."));me:AddDamage("Damage_TianDaoBenYuan1", "Brain", me:RandomFloat(0, 0.75), XT("Heaven's Eruption"));me:ModifierProperty("GodPenaltyAddV",me:RandomInt(10,30)); end else me:AddMsg(XT("以[NAME]Is far from being able to control these gods that contain the breath of heaven,[NAME]As soon as refining started, the origin of the heavens exploded violently.[NAME]Shattered spiritually.[NAME]瞬间殒命。"));me:AddDamage("Damage_TianDaoBenYuan2", "Brain", 1, XT("Heaven's Eruption")); end else me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME]The practice method completely does not match this fairy source,[NAME]Immediately after the start of refining, Xianyuan exploded violently.[NAME]Shattered spiritually.[NAME]Die instantly."));me:AddDamage("Damage_TianDaoBenYuan2", "Brain", 1, XT("Heaven's Eruption")); end story:FinishSecret();
me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME]Still decided to abandon refining this piece of fairy source."))

Story.Name: ZT_DD
Story.Desc: The book has its own golden house, and it also has unlocking locations.

Story.Name: ZT_XXCTY
Story.Desc: Ye Fan and others descended on the Forbidden City of Beidou, which is one of the seven forbidden areas of life. Ye Fan had good luck, said Sacred Fruit, and a few friends of Pember successfully rushed out of the Forbidden City of ancient times. Dongtian accepted. And experienced the birth of Yaodi tomb.

li.Display: Go in Chou Chou (Bodhi seeds are available only for the first time,)

Story.Name: ZT_GWSTSFYX
Story.DisplayName: Dare to ask God if there is a fairy
Story.Desc: After experiencing a series of life and death encounters, Ye Fan can see that the cultivator is no different from a mortal person. He is also greedy. After gaining the sacred heart of the demon emperor, he was held by the demon tribe, then met the East Deity God Ji Haoyue, escaped from the chaos, and was captured by Ji Ziyue. He resisted Ji Ziyue under the influence of yin and yang.

li.Display: Go in 瞅瞅 (obtain bronze bronze hall location unlocked)

Story.Name: ZT_TXM
Story.Desc: Dare to ask if there is an immortal in heaven, and what is the purpose of spiritual practice. Ye Fan and Ji Ziyue both came to Taixuanfeng with serious thoughts. One hundred and eight immortals were scattered, and the two worshipped to get started. .

Story.Name: ZT_HYD
Story.Desc: During his escape with Ji Ziyue, Ye Fan was hunted down by the Ji family because he learned the void fingerprints taught by Ji Ziyue. Chased to the realm of fire by all major forces. .

Story.Name: ZT_ZJCD
Story.Desc: 叶凡在火域修行了一段时间后，趁着世人逐渐忘记他的存在以后，叶凡来到了北域，来到了北域的张家村，因周围流寇而与张家村村民结缘。。

Story.Name: ZT_TCGKD
Story.Desc: 叶凡在从紫山出来后，为了突破而四处劫掠流寇收获了不少的源，也因此尝到甜头，企图到太初古矿寻找机缘。

Story.Name: ZT_YCSD
Story.Desc: 叶凡在张家村喜提一只大黑狗，在黑皇的带领下寻得西皇经，来到了瑶池圣地。

Story.Name: ZT_YZZ
Story.Desc: Ye Fan in front of quzhou young monks, killing Gong Guang and Ji's eight true disciples, forcing Ye Fan had to take refuge in the cave house of the QingYu Wang, take a look to save their brother.

Story.Name: ZT_LCJM
Story.Desc: Ye Fan received the news, Licheng has a nine secret traces, but this message seems to have been deliberately released? Let's go and see it anyway.

Story.Name: ZT_WLC
Story.Desc: 叶凡突破道宫后，第一次行走北域，在神王的庇护下，总算能够抛头露面，寻得一些消息，来到了冰雪宫。
